price: N’iyo dusogongeje umuntu ku mpuhwe ziduturutseho nyuma tukazimwambura, mu by’ukuri ariheba cyane agahakana yivuye inyuma (inema za Allah).
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنَّا رَحۡمَةٗ ثُمَّ نَزَعۡنَٰهَا مِنۡهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٞ كَفُورٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnā al-insāna minnā raḥmatan thumma nazaʿnāhā min'hu innahu layaūsun kafūrun
